content:
Prev: Ice cream for snack Up: Hot Shots vs Major Pain Next: Deciding whether to be home or visitors

The coin flip



For once we were not preassigned as home or visitors; the Hot Shots used the visitor's dugout but flipped for the chance to decide, won, and chose home.
Taken Saturday, May 15, 2004, 10:03:16am.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 6.1Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/1600s @ F2.8, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 125mm (200mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5350:-5, 0.15:13:50:40:3:25:5, Crop, USM 20:5, USM coin 50:5
